name: Arcade Console Pandora Box 6s
shortDescription: Arcade console with 1500 games.
longDescription: Enjoy classic arcade games with this Pandora Box 6s console featuring 1500 built-in games.

name: Wifi Drone E88A Fpv
shortDescription: Drone with FPV camera and long-lasting battery.
longDescription: Capture stunning images from the heights with this Wifi E88A FPV drone equipped with a 4k camera and long-lasting battery. Includes carrying case.

name: Intelligent Programming Robot
shortDescription: Robot with intelligent programming and remote control.
longDescription: This state-of-the-art robot features intelligent programming and can be controlled remotely to perform various actions and movements.

name: 4 In 1 Solar Robot Kit
shortDescription: Kit to build 4 different solar-powered robots.
longDescription: Promote creativity and learning about solar energy with this kit that allows you to build 4 different solar-powered robots.

name: Virtual Pet Tamagotchi
shortDescription: Retro portable virtual pet Tamagotchi.
longDescription: Relive nostalgia with this portable Tamagotchi that allows you to take care of your own virtual pet, feed it, play, and keep it happy.

name: Sciencow 25 in 1 Robot Construction Toys
shortDescription: Set of 25 construction toys to build robots.
longDescription: Boost creativity and problem-solving skills with this set of 25 construction toys that allow you to build various robots and structures.

name: Toy Dart Gun Machine Gun
shortDescription: Dart-firing machine gun with 40 rubber bullets.
longDescription: This toy dart-firing machine gun is safe and fun for simulating missions and adventures. Comes with 40 rubber bullets.

name: Noga Drifter Steering Wheel + Pedals
shortDescription: Steering wheel and pedals for PC, PS3, and PS4.
longDescription: Enhance your gaming experience with this Noga Drifter steering wheel and pedals compatible with PC, PS3, and PS4. Realistic driving sensation.

name: Children's Dance Mat
shortDescription: Interactive dance mat for children.
longDescription: Have fun and exercise with this interactive dance mat that includes various game modes and is ideal for children.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED Pokémon Edition
shortDescription: Nintendo Switch OLED with Pokémon Scarlet & Violet design.
longDescription: Special edition of Nintendo Switch OLED with Pokémon Scarlet & Violet design. Enjoy your favorite games in high definition and take it with you everywhere.

name: TruthFinder Lie Detector Game
shortDescription: Lie detector polygraph game.
longDescription: Put your detective skills to the test with this fun truthfinder lie detector polygraph game. Spend exciting moments with family and friends.

name: VOLANTEXRC Brushless Remote Control Boat AtomicX
shortDescription: VOLANTEXRC Brushless AtomicX remote control boat.
longDescription: Experience the excitement of controlling this VOLANTEXRC Brushless AtomicX remote control boat that reaches speeds of up to 40 MPH.

name: Mould King Pirate Ship Building Blocks Set
shortDescription: Set of building blocks to build a pirate ship.
longDescription: Create your own pirate ship with this Mould King building blocks set. Includes detailed pieces and pirate figures.

name: eOfficce Remote Control Shark Toy 2.4 GHz
shortDescription: Remote control shark toy.
longDescription: Have fun controlling this eOfficce remote control shark toy with 2.4 GHz remote control. Performs surprising turns and movements in the water.

name: High-Speed Electric Race Car Tracks Games
shortDescription: High-speed electric race car tracks.
longDescription: Challenge your friends with these high-speed electric race cars and compete on exciting tracks.

name: TecnoToys Remote Control Car
shortDescription: Remote control car for children and adults.
longDescription: Have fun with this TecnoToys remote control car that provides hours of entertainment for both children and adults.

name: Battery-Operated Wooden Train for Wooden Train Tracks
shortDescription: Battery-operated wooden train for wooden train tracks.
longDescription: Build your own wooden train track and watch this battery-operated train run on the circuit. Includes locomotive and wagons.

name: Scienceland Science Kits for Kids 8-12 years
shortDescription: Science kits for kids 8-12 years.
longDescription: Awaken children's scientific curiosity with these kits that include experiments and educational activities.

name: Dolanus Remote Control Helicopter Blue
shortDescription: Dolanus remote control helicopter.
longDescription: Enjoy the thrill of piloting this Dolanus remote control helicopter. Easy to handle and perfect for beginners.

name: SkyMaster Hero Fighter Remote Control Airplane 21 Cm
shortDescription: SkyMaster Hero Fighter radio control airplane.
longDescription: Pilot this SkyMaster Hero Fighter radio control airplane and perform stunts in the air. Perfect for aviation enthusiasts.
